datasource_id: Meta launches VR game subscription service 'Meta Quest+'  The Global Herald@The Global Herald@Meta
data:
Yahoo Finance published this video item, entitled “Meta launches VR game subscription service ‘Meta Quest+'” – below is their description.
#Meta #VR #youtube
This segment originally aired on June 26, 2023
Yahoo Finance’s Allie Canal, Josh Schafer, and Pras Subramanian discuss
Meta launching a VR subscription service known as ‘Meta Quest+’ which will give users access to two new games each month for $7.99.
